DeltaMath

DeltaMath is one of a kind initiative made by a mathematics teacher to overcome the students’ resistance with the subject of mathematics by making students interaction with mathematics and both teachers as easy and fun as possible. The basic idea behind DeltaMath is to make mathematics easy for students by providing easy access to problems, tests and it’s solutions, and interaction with top of the line teachers available. But having a good application means nothing when you don’t have a good looking landing site to attract the users. That’s where this project comes to rescue.
